name: Triple Jam
description:
Submission to MiniJam 27: Celebration

Help Jammy to collect all fruits in order to open the gate! You have to collect them in the correct order to make it through the level. If you get stuck press R to restart. Good luck and I hope you enjoy playing!

-ManuGamesDev

Controls:

Move: WASD
Rotate Camera: Left and Right Arrow Keys
Restart Game: R
